item.description: A 21-year-old allegedly assaulted a fellow inmate and guard in a violent assault.

item.title: Four photographers taken to hospital after Brodie Kostecki’s horror crash in Supercars qualifying session
item.description: Emergency services rushed to the scene following the high-speed incident.

item.title: Aussie swimming superstar Mollie O’Callaghan wins double bonus for rare feat
item.description: The 21-year-old obliterated a star-studded field to break her own world record from seven days ago.

item.title: Source of NSW mystery beach balls finally revealed to have come from a waste treatment facility
item.description: The revelation comes after months of public confusion and concern.

item.title: Devastating update as young girl badly injured in Wantirna, Melbourne crash dies in hospital
item.description: The girl and her four-year-old brother were in the back seat of their family car when it collided with another vehicle on Thursday.

item.title: Attica storms home to pip favourite Shangri La Boy in Spring Champion Stakes at Randwick
item.description: ‘For him to do this in his first preparation, it’s really exciting.’

item.title: Driver killed in horror crash on rural Victorian road in Parwan
item.description: The vehicle hit a tree.

item.title: Champion jockey James McDonald makes history as Via Sistina wins ‘extraordinary’ Cox Plate
item.description: The final edition of the $6m classic at Moonee Valley was one of the best in its long history.

item.title: Heartbreak at Perth Zoo as beloved Sumatran tiger Jaya dies after cancer battle
item.description: ‘After a physical exam, it was apparent that he could no longer experience an acceptable quality of life.’

item.title: Scott Morrison backs Kevin Rudd and calls for ‘AUKUS Tsar’ with wide-ranging powers
item.description: It contradicts reports the US President had forgiven the former Prime Minister.

item.title: Chaz Mostert pulls off stunning win in first Supercars finals race on the Gold Coast
item.description: The victory came after a ‘gut-wrenching’ situation for pole sitter Ryan Wood.

item.title: Charges laid after Australian cricket stars allegedly touched inappropriately in India ahead of Women’s World Cup match
item.description: A statement has been issued after the World Cup players were allegedly stalked near their team hotel.

item.title: Reece Walsh makes ‘surreal’ announcement in leading Kangaroos to 26-6 win over England on debut
item.description: The superstar has well and truly emerged as ‘one of the best we’ve seen’.

item.title: Alana King delivers greatest spell in World Cup history as Australia defeat South Africa
item.description: The spinner took her first four wickets without conceding a single run, then kept going to rewrite the record books.

item.title: CCTV shows moment car crashes into elderly couple sitting outside café in Leichhardt, Sydney
item.description: One woman was pinned by the car and suffered serious injuries, while the driver allegedly fled the scene.

item.title: Sam Kerr ends injury nightmare with long-awaited Matildas return in 2-1 win over Wales
item.description: The 32-year-old has spoken after putting 725 days of heartache behind her in an Aussie win.

item.title: Emotional scenes as Virat Kohli bids farewell to Australia - for now, as cricket boss flags Big Bash dream
item.description: The Indian legend has signed off but a ‘realistic’ plan has been hatched for a possible return in the Big Bash.

item.title: Teenager seriously injured in Broadmeadows stabbing as police hunt for attacker
item.description: The attack happened near a community sporting event where a man armed with a machete was seen running through a crowd just the day before.

item.title: World No.1 Jannik Sinner drops another truth bomb on Alex de Minaur
item.description: The Aussie tried to ask some new questions but his superstar rival had all the answers, and he knew it.

item.title: June Lockhart star of Lassie and Lost in Space dies aged 100
item.description: Lockhart’s career spanned over eight decades, leaving a lasting legacy as one of television’s most beloved maternal figures.

item.title: Man killed in stabbing at Salamanca in Hobart, Tasmania
item.description: Two men were stabbed during a fight between two groups of people.

item.title: Oscar Piastri’s title dream on the brink after brutal qualifying result in Mexico
item.description: The slumping Aussie could be just hours away from losing his championship lead to teammate Lando Norris.

item.title: Woman killed, three seriously injured in truck and car collision on Western Highway in Burrumbeet
item.description: Crash investigators are probing what caused the deadly early-morning collision.

item.title: Champion jockey James McDonald visits injured apprentice Tom Prebble hours after Cox Plate win
item.description: The superstar dusted himself off to take his trophy for a very special visit on Saturday night.

item.title: Shots fired into Central Coast home with two toddlers inside in drive-by shooting in Spencer
item.description: A car parked in the driveway was also damaged in the gunfire.

item.title: Stunned Aussie champion Lani Pallister utterly destroys legend Katie Ledecky’s world record
item.description: ‘I never thought I’d have a world record.’

item.title: Woman dies after being hit by car in Pinelands, Palmerston, NT
item.description: The woman was hit on the outbound lanes of a highway.

item.title: Why don’t more women apply for The Chase Australia?
item.description: ‘Be prepared to look an idiot on TV and nobody will mind.’

item.title: Broome man charged with murder after woman dies from stabbing in alleged family violence attack at WA home
item.description: The woman was rushed to hospital but succumbed to her injuries the following day.

item.title: Jockey Mark Zahra sanctioned for failing to ride Observer to the line in Mooney Valley Vase victory
item.description: Bruce McAvaney thought the jockey might have had some regret, and indeed stewards took action.

item.title: More than 1000 homes lose power after driver crashes into Yorke Peninsula power pole in SA
item.description: The driver was rushed to hospital after the crash.

item.title: Cats ‘run in a swimming pool’ against Bulldogs to keep AFLW finals hopes alive
item.description: Geelong need a miracle but they’ve given themselves a chance with a wet win over the Dogs.

item.title: AFL superstar Marcus Bontempelli marries partner Neila Brenning in ‘beautiful’ overseas wedding
item.description: The happy couple tied the knot at a luxury ranch on the other side of the world.

item.title: 7NEWS The Issue Podcast: Former US spy boss Mike Rogers takes aim at Julian Assange and Edward Snowden
item.description: ‘I would totally disagree with the course of action that they both chose’.

item.title: Supercars cult hero Chaz Mostert seals famous Gold Coast double after Bathurst 1000 heartbreak
item.description: The superstar has shot himself into title contention as a former champion was knocked out.

item.title: 7NEWS presenter Angela Cox takes on 7 Bridges Walk in honour of late mother’s loss to cancer to raise awareness
item.description: The annual event raises funds and awareness to support cancer research, prevention and care for those affected.

item.title: Beloved actor Michael Caton reveals serious fall and calls for urgent action on epidemic
item.description: ‘It’s a huge amount of people injured and die, and there seems to be nothing really being done about it.’

item.title: Nelly Furtado announces retirement from music, performance after body-shaming controversy
item.description: The Canadian had a string of hits in Australia and around the world in the early years of the century.

item.title: The Voice reveals its remaining grand finalists: Alyssa Delpopolo and Cle Morgan
item.description: The rising stars will represent Kate Miller-Heidke and Ronan Keating in the competition’s ultimate singing battle.
